name: Air Fryer Lava Cakes
author: Yoly
summary: Easy recipe for those days when you want something chocolaty and quick to make. This recipe is for 2 lava cakes but can be easily doubled.
directions: Preheat an air fryer to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Combine chocolate chips and butter in a microwave-safe bowl
Stir and microwave at 15-second intervals until almost melted
Remove from the microwave and stir until chocolate is completely melted and thoroughly combined
Mix powdered sugar, egg, egg yolk, vanilla extract, and salt into the melted chocolate; whisk until combined
Add flour and mix until incorporated
Pour batter into the prepared ramekins and place into the air fryer basket
Cover the ramekins with large pieces of foil, tucking ends underneath to prevent foil from flying off
Remove foil and continue cooking until edges are set, an additional 2 to 4 minutes
Remove from the air fryer and let sit for 5 minutes
Invert onto dessert plates and serve immediately
